mapper.select: select c.*,t.Name,n.Model,n.Detail from fir_checkdevice c join fir_devicetype t on(c.DeviceTypeId=t.Id) left join fir_device n on(c.DeviceId=n.Id) where c.Id=#{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE fir_checkdevice SET DeviceId=#{DeviceId}, DeviceTypeId=#{DeviceTypeId}, CompanyId=#{CompanyId}, ManagerId=#{ManagerId}, ManagerName=#{ManagerName}, Description=#{Description}, Certificate=#{Certificate}, SeverityLevel=#{SeverityLevel}, AddTime=#{AddTime}, Status=#{Status} WHERE Id = #{Id}
